page.title: 15BRMB Walkathon, Kings Heath
page.content: We walked on Sunday, May 5th. It was raining that day but we were alright - we had raincoats. We walked {25 miles} round the{outer circle.}It took from 11 o'clock till 8 pm. It took us {9 hours} to do the whole circuit. We passed Stechford swimming baths and 3 parks in Fox Hollies. Going down one of the subways we saw a film crew for TV News. {BRMB} organised the Walkathon. It was to {raise money for charities}. That's why people had {sponsor forms}. The Walkathon was great fun. I walked it with my friend Angela, who lives down the road from me. We started at Kings Heath Park at 11 o'clock. We had sweets money and sandwiches. We saw lots of people who walked in a big group. We saw{some people dressed up.}We saw some people dressed as ducks and a man dressed up as a priest. There were others dressed as Dracula and witches.
